name: Cups Away!
description:
Made in Construct 3 for Montreal's Pixelles Game Incubator VI

This is my first attempt at making a small video game. I envisioned this game to be made for mobile and will be making the necessary updates in the near future. I will also be updating the sprites and background art.

Credits
Cat sprite: dcatly/public domain 
Player sprite: Reixaldo/Creative Commons 3.0.   
Title Song: 2012 Iwan Gabovitch "Benvenuta Estate! (Mazurka) Short Loop"
